questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a Scout law?
answers: A Scout does a good deed every day
A Scout is to be Trusted
A Scout belongs to the world-wide family of Scouts

questions.question: Which of these is a Scout challenge badge?
Where was the first Scout camp held?
Which came first?
answers: Venture Scouts being replaced by Explorer Scouts
Girls being allowed into Cubs and Scouts

questions.question: Scouts shake hands with the left hand, why?
answers: Baden Powell was impressed by the Ashanti people who offered their left hands when they greeted him, as it meant lowering their shield  and thus their protection
The right hand is considered ‘unclean’ in some cultures
Baden Powell’s right hand was badly wounded in the battle of Mafeking, so he couldn’t shake hands with it
